about_the_game:
Dwarven Defense Prologue is a minimalist tower defense game. Plan, build and upgrade your defenses at daytime, so that you survive the hordes of undead attacking you at night. Aided by powerfull abilities and an autonomous hero unit, your strategic skills will be put to the test.

Prologue

The prologue features one level which is equiped with an endless mode for highscore hunting.
This feedback on this small scope game will help shape the paid version.
The paid version will feature 3+ Levels, more Towers, Abilites, Heroes and a progression system.

The undead are here!
But fear not. With the help of your best dwarven engeneers and old magic runes you can hold you ground. Build your defenses and survive the apocalypse.

Build mighty towers


Upgrade your defenses


Battle the undead


Recruit powerful heroes


Cast magical abilites

About the Game

Dwarven Defense Prologue is a minimalist tower defense game. Plan, build and upgrade your defenses at daytime, so that you survive the hordes of undead attacking you at night. Aided by powerfull abilities and an autonomous hero unit, your strategic skills will be put to the test.

Prologue

The prologue features one level which is equiped with an endless mode for highscore hunting.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.4, Ubuntu 18.04 or CentOS 7
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD (2.5 GHz or superior)
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 1050 or higher / AMD RX 560 or higher
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13 or newer
  • Processor: Apple M1 or higher (No Intel Support)
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Apple M1 or higher
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Dwarven Defense Prologue is a grid based tower defense game. You build towers during the day and defend against the undead during the night.
